part_description: Consists of three vertical sections, each with horizontal slats. Two outer sections have evenly spaced slats; the middle section is solid.
internal_interaction_description: The horizontal slats are parallel and uniformly spaced within each section, providing structural support and creating a pattern. The outer sections' slats allow for airflow or light passage, while the solid middle section offers stability and separation.
external_interaction_description: The panel can be used as a partition or decorative element, allowing light and air to pass through the slatted sections while providing privacy or separation in a space. It can be mounted on walls or used freestanding in various environments.
